page.title: 06CROWLE SHOW
page.content: CROWLE SHOW HAS BEEN HELD FOR OVER A HUNDRED YEARS.IT IS HELD ON SPRING BANK HOLIDAY SATURDAY EVERY YEAR.A{ {SHOW QUEEN}IS CHOSEN EVERY YEAR AND IS CROWNED BY THE RETIRING QUEEN AT THE OPENING CEREMONY.IT IS HELD IN A FIELD OFF WHARF ROAD BUT HAS BEEN IN OTHER PLACES.THERE ARE{SHOW JUMPING} ESPECIALLY FOR YOUNG RIDERS COMPETITIONS AND A DOG SHOW WHICH ATTRACTS A LOT OF ENTRIES.ROUND THE FIELD ARE STALLS, CHILDRENS GAMES AND RAFFLES.LOCAL FIRMS DISPLAY OR ADVERTISE AT THE SHOW.THE CHILDREN HAVE SOME RACES.SOME TYPICAL EXHIBITS AND DISPLAYS WOULD BE TRACTORS, FIRE SERVICE FACILITIES, BAND AND ARMY MARCHING.THE WEATHER IS USUALLY COLD.
